attributes.action: ensure that details of all MPs who may have broken the law in claiming and receiving expenses to which they were not entitled are referred to the Crown Prosecution Service in line with the Government's tough stance on benefit fraud.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If members of the public claimed benefits to which they were not entitled they would be prosecuted - surely avoiding paying Capital Gains Tax or claiming mortgage relief for a mortgage that doesn't exist (and many other instances) fall into the categories of tax evasion and benefit fraud - and should be dealt with accordingly!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
